table_description: Information about PostgreSQL database descriptions, including ID, configuration, status, and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: ipAllowList
columns.description: A list of IP addresses allowed to access the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the PostgreSQL instance was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: expiresAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the PostgreSQL instance expires.

columns.name: databaseName
columns.description: The name of the PostgreSQL database.

columns.name: databaseUser
columns.description: The username for the PostgreSQL database.

columns.name: environmentId
columns.description: The ID of the environment associated with the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: highAvailabilityEnabled
columns.description: Indicates whether high availability is enabled for the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Information about the owner of the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: plan
columns.description: The plan associated with the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: diskSizeGB
columns.description: The disk size of the PostgreSQL instance in gigabytes.

columns.name: primaryPostgresID
columns.description: The ID of the primary PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: region
columns.description: The region where the PostgreSQL instance is located.

columns.name: readReplicas
columns.description: A list of read replicas associated with the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: role
columns.description: The role of the PostgreSQL instance (e.g., primary, replica).

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The version of PostgreSQL used in the instance.

columns.name: suspended
columns.description: Indicates whether the PostgreSQL instance is suspended.

columns.name: suspenders
columns.description: A list of suspenders associated with the PostgreSQL instance.

columns.name: dashboardUrl
columns.description: The URL of the PostgreSQL instance's dashboard.
